course_description: Required for HPM students. Examines the formulation and implementation of health policy in the US health care system. Emphasizes the application of analytical contributions from health economics, health services research, and other policy-related disciplines to current issues in health care delivery, organization, and financing.
schedule_location: Th 9am-11:50am in Claudia Nance Rollins AUD
